alert.note: Alert for Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:25PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Fremont County through 300 PM MDT... At 224 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Torrey Lake, which is also 7 miles south of Dubois, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. Funnel cloud possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Torrey Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East
